title: Chiropractor Belvidere IL | Acacia Chiropractic & Acupuncture P.C.
author: - Walt R
description: Belvidere & chiropractor Dr. Danielle Anderson has 14+ years' experience. Certified in acupuncture & animal chiropractic. Book today.
cleaned_text: to Help You Feel Your Best Get Outstanding Care at Acacia Chiropractic & Acupuncture P.C. [Belvidere chiropractor Dr. Danielle Anderson](/dr-danielle-anderson/) is passionate about helping patients feel great and function at their highest potential. At [Acacia Chiropractic & Acupuncture P.C.](/about-us/), we take the time to help patients understand the underlying cause of their pain, as well as what to expect from our care.
